sentences.en: An aeroplane offers you an unusual and breathtaking view of the world.
sentences.cn: 飞机为你提供非凡的,令人惊诧不已的地球景色. (句中的view既有凝视的动作含义,又有风景的状态含义)

sentences.en: An aeroplane started for Tokyo yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天有一架飞机飞往东京.

sentences.en: As he stepped off the aeroplane, he was shot dead.
sentences.cn: 他一走下飞机便中枪身亡。

sentences.en: I can see that aeroplane, but I can't see a bird.
sentences.cn: 我能看见那架飞机, 但是小鸟我就看不见了.

sentences.en: I didn't get a wink of sleep on the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我在飞机上没合一下眼。

sentences.en: I had made a model aeroplane.
It was a clumsy looking aeroplane.
Mommy and I went in an aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我和妈妈登上一架飞机。

sentences.en: On the aeroplane I was befriended by a delightful German woman.
sentences.cn: 在飞机上，一位讨人喜欢的德国女士对我就像朋友一样。

sentences.en: She has jumped from an aeroplane four times.
sentences.cn: 她已经4次从飞机上跳下。

sentences.en: The aeroplane landed us at the airport in Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 飞机把我们降落在巴塞罗那机场。

sentences.en: The aeroplane was flying a few feet above the sea.
sentences.cn: 飞机正在距海面几英尺的低空飞行.

sentences.en: The aeroplane was gyrating about the sky in a most unpleasant fashion.
sentences.cn: 飞机在空中盘旋，令人不堪忍受。

sentences.en: The aeroplane will travel at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机的速度将是音速的两倍。

sentences.en: The centre of pressure moves rearward and the aeroplane becomes unbalanced.
sentences.cn: 气压中心后移使飞机失去平衡。

sentences.en: The noise of the aeroplane deafened us.
sentences.cn: 飞机的噪声使我们耳朵听不见了。

sentences.en: They saw enemy paratroops dropping from the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 他们看到敌人伞兵部队从飞机上降下来.

sentences.en: With your own aeroplane you fly where and when you want to , often to and from airfields that are not served by airlines .
sentences.cn: 用自己的飞机，你可以随时去你想去的地方，起降的机场通常也不对航空公司开放。

trans.tran_en: a flying vehicle with wings and at least one engine
